events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The reported issue was categorized under refund since the customer wants their money back for the incorrect item.
Assigning the case to an available customer service agent specialized in refund handling.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a picture of the item you actually received to process the refund?
Here is my order number 987654321 and attached is the photo showing the wrong item I got instead of the one I ordered.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated your refund for the full amount. You should receive a confirmation email shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and resolving this issue fast. I appreciate the prompt refund processing.
The refund request was completed successfully and the case is now resolved with customer satisfaction.
We are checking in to confirm you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
As we have not heard otherwise, we are closing this case. Please contact us anytime if further help is needed.
